item.title: Final Project
item.description: Project Changes for Spring 2018 The final project instructions will be undergoing revision for Spring 2018. The instructions on GitHub should not be considered current yet. Overview The final project for this course requires students to clean and map non-emergency call data from the City of St. Louis. These data describe the presence of various types of problems in City neighborhoods. The project brings together many of the scientific computing and GI science skills that are developed over the course of the semester.
